page.title: 04Getting to work by a miner.
page.content: I get up at 5.20 a.m.,I wash and go downstairs. For breakfast I have a cup of coffee only as I do not like eating early in the morning. At 5.45 a.m.I catch the bus to Cynheidre Colliery. The bus arrives at the Colliery at 6.10 a.m. and I go to the baths to change from my clean clothes into my working clothes. Whilst changing I have a chat with the men from the oncoming shift. My day underground starts at 7 a.m.. I descend 600m. down the mine shaft in a cage. At this level I board transport on an underground railway, this takes me 4Km. to the end of the line, I then walk 200m. where I check in on a time book. Before reaching my place of work I have another 300m. to walk, the time is now about 8 a.m..
